    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNewToy()
     
    void
    displayMenuMethod()
    The Main Menu method This method displays the main menu and handles the user's input
    void
    giftSuggestion()
    This method handles the gift suggestion option It prompts the user to enter the age, toy type, minimum price, and maximum price It then searches the inventory for the toys that match the user's input If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count
    void
    loadFiles()
    This method loads the data from the file into the arraylist It reads the file and creates the toys based on the data in the file while adding them to their appropriate arraylist from the parent class (toys)
    void
    removeToy()
     
    void
    run()
    This is the main method of the application
    void
    save()
    This method saves the data from the arraylist into the file It writes the data to the file based on the type of the toy
    void
    searchBySerialNumber()
    This method handles the search by serial number option It prompts the user to enter a serial number and then searches the inventory for the toy with that serial number If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count
    void
    searchByToyName()
    This method handles the search by toy name option It prompts the user to enter a toy name and then searches the inventory for the toy with that name If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count
    void
    searchByToyType()
    This method handles the search by toy type option It prompts the user to enter a toy type and then searches the inventory for the toy with that type If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count

      public void searchBySerialNumber()
      This method handles the search by serial number option It prompts the user to enter a serial number and then searches the inventory for the toy with that serial number If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count

    • giftSuggestion

      public void giftSuggestion() throws giftSuggestionException
      This method handles the gift suggestion option It prompts the user to enter the age, toy type, minimum price, and maximum price It then searches the inventory for the toys that match the user's input If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count
      Throws:
      giftSuggestionException

    • searchProsses

      public void searchProsses(ArrayList<Toys> foundToys)
      This method handles the search by toy type option It prompts the user to enter a toy type and then searches the inventory for the toy with that type If the toy is found, it prompts the user to purchase it and then updates the toy's available count

    • loadFiles

      public void loadFiles()
      This method loads the data from the file into the arraylist It reads the file and creates the toys based on the data in the file while adding them to their appropriate arraylist from the parent class (toys)

      public void save()
      This method saves the data from the arraylist into the file It writes the data to the file based on the type of the toy
